Death From Above Medium Armor Set
kDesc

The complete Death From Above Medium Armour Set, this bundle contains all five parts that make up the full Death From Above Armour Set: 
 
 1. Death From Above - Medium Assault Body Armour 
 2. Death From Above - Medium Assault Boots 
 3. Death From Above - Medium Assault Gloves 
 4. Death From Above - Medium Assault Helmet 
 5. Death From Above - Medium Assault Leg Armour [#Legal]

L'ensemble complet Armure moyenne Death From Above, avec les cinq éléments composant l'ensemble Armure Death From Above complet : 
 
 1. Death From Above - Gilet d'assaut moyen 
 2. Death From Above - Bottes d'assaut moyennes 
 3. Death From Above - Gants d'assaut moyens 
 4. Death From Above - Casque d'assaut moyen 
 5. Death From Above - Jambières d'assaut moyennes [#Legal]

Das komplette mittelschwere Rüstungsset Death From Above; dieses Bündel enthält alle fünf Bestandteile der kompletten Death From Above-Rüstung: 
 
 1. Death From Above - Panzerweste für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 2. Death From Above - Stiefel für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 3. Death From Above - Handschuhe für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 4. Death From Above - Helm für mittelschwere Angriffe 
 5. Death From Above - Beinrüstung für mittelschwere Angriffe [#Legal]

Set completo di armature d'assalto medio Death From Above, contiene i cinque componenti che compongono l'intero set di armatura Death From Above: 
 
 1. Death From Above - armatura per il corpo d'assalto medio 
 2. Death From Above - stivali d'assalto medio 
 3. Death From Above - guanti d'assalto medio 
 4. Death From Above - casco d'assalto medio 
 5. Death From Above - armatura per le gambe d'assalto medio [#Legal]

El set completo de Armadura media Death From Above, contiene las 5 partes que componen la armadura: 
 
 1. Death From Above - Armadura corporal de asalto media 
 2. Death From Above - Botas de asalto medias 
 3. Death From Above - Guantes de asalto medios 
 4. Death From Above - Casco de asalto medio 
 5. Death From Above - Armadura de asalto media para pierna [#Legal]

완전한 죽음의 그림자 중형 방어구 세트입니다. 죽음의 그림자 방어구 세트를 완성하는 다섯 개의 아이템으로 구성되어 있습니다:
 
 1. 죽음의 그림자 - 중형 돌격 상체방어구 (남성)
 2. 죽음의 그림자 - 중형 돌격부츠 (남성)
 3. 죽음의 그림자 - 중형 돌격장갑 (남성)
 4. 죽음의 그림자 - 중형 돌격헬멧 (남성)
 5. 죽음의 그림자 - 중형 돌격 하체방어구 (남성) [#Legal]

The complete Death From Above Medium Armor Set, this bundle contains all five parts that make up the full Death From Above Armor Set:
 
 1. Death From Above - Medium Assault Body Armor (Men)
 2. Death From Above - Medium Assault Boots (Men)
 3. Death From Above - Medium Assault Gloves (Men)
 4. Death From Above - Medium Assault Helmet (Men)
 5. Death From Above - Medium Assault Leg Armor (Men) [#Legal]

 2. 死從天降 - 中型突擊靴子(男用) 
 3. 死從天降 - 中型突擊手套(男用) 
 4. 死從天降 - 中型突擊頭盔(男用) 
 5. 死從天降 - 中型突擊護脛(男用) [#Legal]
